'''''Ever So Slightly Inferior''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Algorithm of Semi-Intransient Matrix of Overseer Network]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
